name: Untitled Shmup test demo
description:
Trying my hand at making a bullet-hell/ Shmup game. There is only one stage as of now for me just to try things out 

there are 3 power ups: purple gives speed, blue gives basic shot, and green gives split shot. to change which type it is you will have to shoot it and it cycles between type

the level design is taking "heavy" inspiration from an RPGmaker game called zero base + also using the same sprites since it was available
